Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game_board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game_board.Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
Stores information about the 25 Cells that make up the Board. Can return information about specific cells or their neighbors.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Cell[][] cells
    Array of all the Cells making up the Game Board.

  • Field Details

    • cells

      private final Cell[][] cells
      Array of all the Cells making up the Game Board.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Board constructor. Creates a new Board for the Game, instantiating an ArrayList of 25 Cells.

  • Method Details

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(int x, int y) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the requested Cell, ie the column
      y - the y-coordinate of the requested Cell, ie the row
      Returns:
      the requested Cell
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when the requested coordinates don't identify a Cell of the Board

    • getAllCells

      public java.util.ArrayList<Cell> getAllCells()
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Cells, containing all the Cells of the Board of this Game

    • setCell

      public void setCell​(Cell cell, int x, int y) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Parameters:
      cell - the Cell we want to set
      x - the x-coordinate of the Cell
      y - the y-coordinate of the Cell
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - when trying to set a Cell with coordinates that don't identify a Cell of the Board

    • getNeighbors

      public java.util.ArrayList<Cell> getNeighbors​(Cell pos)
      Parameters:
      pos - the Cell object indicating the position we want to know the neighbors of
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the Cells surrounding the requested one

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Indicates whether some other Board is equal to this one.
      Overrides:
      equals in class java.lang.Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the reference object with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if this board is the same as the obj argument, false otherwise.
